details.title: Built-in test maturation concepts using test program set and relational database technologies
details.abstract: Continual improvement of avionic built-in test (BIT) is critical to mission readiness and capability. This paper discusses how test program set (TPS) and relational database (RDB) technologies can be used for this purpose. Important aspects for continually improving avionic BIT and TPS operation are discussed
details.journal_title: IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Magazine
